paper_completed.detail: You have completed all your papers. Would you like to complete more?

paper_not_completed.warning: No matching paper found in the papers table!

paper_in_progress.detail:
We see that you have already started annotating {paper_title}. You have identified {protocols} protocols and {solutions} solutions in it, and you have already annotated in detail {annotated} of these solutions.

To continue annotating this paper, press "Continue annotation" below.

Even though we do not encourage it, if you have really changed your mind about the paper you chose to annotate, then press "Start new annotation".Please note, we only allow each annotator a maximum of two "abandoned" papers. The "Start new annotation" button will be disabled once you reach this limit.

2_pick_paper.title: Select the paper you will annotate
2_pick_paper.detail: Go through the list of five options we offer below and select the paper you are most comfortable with. If you don't like any of the five papers, click the "Refresh paper list" button for a new set.

5_detail_picker.title: Paper Annotation

sidebar.doi_link_false: DOI link not available for this paper.

5_detail_picker.no_content_tab: No content available for this section.
